title: Loot is not active
body: Idk why, but I have the problem of the loot not showing. I can't click on loot. Btw, I'm still lvl 3, almost 4.

replies.body: Your Hextech Loot becomes active at level 5, so no worries there. You'll still be accumulating order/chaos tokens if you've completed missions, but you will need to hit level 5 before you're able to use them.
